name: yaml-multiline
description: Find the right syntax for your YAML multiline strings

scripts.clean: yarn && find . | grep -v '^./node_modules' | git check-ignore --stdin | xargs -r rm
scripts.build:style: touch content/style.min.css && npm run build:index && sass content/style.scss > content/style.css && uncss -u uncssrc.json content/index.html | uglifycss --max-line-len 160 > content/style.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:style && npm run build:index
scripts.deploy: npm run build:style && pug -O '{production:true}' content/index.pug && npm run compress && scp content/index.html* content/favicon.ico* content/favicon-512.png* yaml-multiline.info:/srv/http-static/yaml-multiline.info/
